name: Reactions in 10s
description:
https://ldj.am/$300356

a jam game made in Ludum dare 51.

If you’re walking to work on a normal morning and an unknown passerby pours coffee all over you, I’m guessing you’ll be upset. Isn’t it a pretty upset thing to be upset about? But what if you aren’t upset? In what circumstance would you not be upset, or even emotionally reacted to such a thing?

Wouldn’t you be annoyed if someone on the metro Stepped on your shoe?

Do you get a nice feeling when you eating delicious food?

Is there a standard reply to emotions?

You now have 10 seconds to find the “correct” emotion.

I’ll tell why.
